content:
All the results that are named _of_completeSpace in Analysis/InnerProductSpace/Projection uses HasOrthogonalProjection and not CompleteSpace (I'm guessing that they're called that because we didn't have HasOrthogonalProjection then?). Should we deprecate these and call them _of_hasOrthogonalProjection instead?

The results: docs#Submodule.sup_orthogonal_inf_of_completeSpace, docs#Submodule.sup_orthogonal_of_completeSpace, and docs#Submodule.isCompl_orthogonal_of_completeSpace.
